name: MusicXMLPlayer
description: An open source JavaScript engine for displaying MusicXML based on VexFlow.

scripts.build-cpp: npx emsdk install ^1.40.1 && npx emsdk activate ^1.40.1 && npx emcc -s SINGLE_FILE=1 -s EXPORT_ES6=1 -s MODULARIZE=1 -s EXPORT_NAME="'SynthetiserModule'" -s ALLOW_MEMORY_GROWTH=1 -s EXPORTED_FUNCTIONS=['_LoadNote','_GetReplayedInstruments','_AddReplayInstrument','_ClearAll','_SetReplayedInstrumentVolume','_SetReplayedInstrumentInstrument','_TriggerNote','_ReleaseNote','_ReleaseAllNotes','_GetNotesTriggered','_SampleData']  -s EXTRA_EXPORTED_RUNTIME_METHODS=["cwrap"] -O3 --bind -o worker/SynthetiserModule.js cpp/main.cpp
